guide.introduction: My daughter wanted to be Mona Lisa for Halloween, so this is what we came up with. It basically consists of two parts, the dress and the frame/picture.
guide.introduction_rendered:
My daughter wanted to be Mona Lisa for Halloween, so this is what we came up with. It basically consists of two parts, the dress and the frame/picture.

Tools
  • Sewing machine

lines.text: First you need to make the dress. Depending on your closet, you may be able to pull out something that could work. We used a McCalls sewing pattern (MP343, to be exact) and an appropriate dark brown fabric to create the dress.
lines.text_raw: First you need to make the dress. Depending on your closet, you may be able to pull out something that could work. We used a McCalls sewing pattern (MP343, to be exact) and an appropriate dark brown fabric to create the dress.

lines.text: After picking your fabric, follow the directions for your sewing pattern to complete the dress.
lines.text_raw: After picking your fabric, follow the directions for your sewing pattern to complete the dress.

lines.text: Print out the file ML_Background.jpg on a large-format printer.
lines.text_raw: Print out the file [http://cdn.makezine.com/make/2012/10//ML_Background.jpg|ML_Background.jpg] on a large-format printer.

lines.text: Cover the back side of the printout with packing tape. This will make it a little more durable.
lines.text_raw: Cover the back side of the printout with packing tape. This will make it a little more durable.

lines.text: Cut two 1"x24" pieces of foam core and hot-glue to the sides on the backside of the background.
lines.text_raw: Cut two 1"x24" pieces of foam core and hot-glue to the sides on the backside of the background.

lines.text: Using the foam core make a frame with an opening 16" wide and 22" tall. That created a good frame for my daughter; you may need to adjust it for you.
lines.text_raw: Using the foam core make a frame with an opening 16" wide and 22" tall. That created a good frame for my daughter; you may need to adjust it for you.

lines.text: Add decorations as desired and paint gold. I used a brush-on gold; spray paint would eat into the foam.
lines.text_raw: Add decorations as desired and paint gold. I used a brush-on gold; spray paint would eat into the foam.

lines.text: Once the frame is painted, tape the top edge of the background to  the top edge of the frame to create a hinge. See image.
lines.text_raw: Once the frame is painted, tape the top edge of the background to  the top edge of the frame to create a hinge. See image.

lines.text: Cut a small hole into the foam core side pieces. Feed one end of the elastic through and tie a knot to hold it in place. Repeat for the other side.
lines.text_raw: Cut a small hole into the foam core side pieces. Feed one end of the elastic through and tie a knot to hold it in place. Repeat for the other side.

lines.text: Attach the front end of the elastic to the opposite side of the gold frame (to the back of the gold frame - see image) I used straight pins through the elastic into the edge of the foam core.
lines.text_raw: Attach the front end of the elastic to the opposite side of the gold frame (to the back of the gold frame - see image) I used straight pins through the elastic into the edge of the foam core.

lines.text: Now that you have an "X" of elastic, we need to add one more piece to keep the frame sitting on your shoulders.
lines.text_raw: Now that you have an "X" of elastic, we need to add one more piece to keep the frame sitting on your shoulders.

lines.text: Sew a six-inch piece of elastic to the other two. The goal is to form a triangle for the head to go through.
lines.text_raw: Sew a six-inch piece of elastic to the other two. The goal is to form a triangle for the head to go through.

lines.text: For my daughter, I needed to attach  the elastic "X"  to the background image. To do this, reinforce the paper with some duct tape, and sew the elastic to it.
lines.text_raw: For my daughter, I needed to attach  the elastic "X"  to the background image. To do this, reinforce the paper with some duct tape, and sew the elastic to it.

guide.summary: Make a costume for the most famous painting of the western world.
